scripts.css:dev: npm run scss:dev && npm run autoprefixer:dev
scripts.start: parallelshell 'npm run start:dev' 'npm run watch:scss' 'npm run watch:templates'
scripts.start:dev: npm run clean:dev && npm run css:dev && npm run templates:dev && npm run lint && npm run serve:dev
scripts.autoprefixer:dev: postcss --no-map -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers '> 0.5%, last 2 versions, Firefox ESR, not dead' -r .tmp/styles/*
scripts.autoprefixer:prod: postcss --map {inline: false} -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers '> 0.5%, last 2 versions, Firefox ESR, not dead' -r dist/styles/*
scripts.templates:dev: node scripts/templates.js && nunjucks index.njk .tmp/data.json -p src -o .tmp && rimraf .tmp/data.json
